idea-plugin.change-notes:
3.0.1 (2023-11-17)

  • FEATURE/功能：

    • Introduced the One-Click Unit Test Generation feature. This new feature automatically generates executable unit test files from selected code blocks, eliminating the need for manual copying and pasting. This enhancement streamlines the testing process, boosting efficiency and simplicity in code testing.
    • 推出一键生成单元测试功能。这个新功能能够从选定的代码块自动生成可执行的单元测试文件，省去了手动复制和粘贴的步骤。这一增强功能简化了测试过程，提高了代码测试的效率和简便性。
    • Added a Multi-Dialogue Mechanism for improved content generation. This mechanism allows for more in-depth conversations, enabling our AIGC (Artificial Intelligence Generated Content) system to produce more accurate and refined content based on user interactions.
    • 添加了多重对话机制，用于改进内容生成。该机制允许更深入的对话交流，使我们的AIGC（人工智能生成内容）系统能够基于用户互动产生更准确、更精细的内容。

  • IMPROVEMENT/优化：

    • Enhanced the interaction experience with the AIGC system, ensuring smoother and more efficient communication, leading to better understanding and more precise content results.
    • 加强了与AIGC系统的互动体验，确保交流更加流畅和高效，从而更好地理解用户需求，生成更准确的内容结果。

2.12.2 (2023-11-17)

  • FEATURE/功能：

    • Upgraded to the latest GPT-4 Turbo model released by OpenAI on November 6, 2023. This update significantly enhances code generation capabilities, ensuring compatibility with the cutting-edge language modeling advancements for improved code accuracy and execution.
    • 升级至OpenAI于2023年11月6日发布的最新GPT-4 Turbo模型。此更新大幅增强了代码生成能力，确保插件与最新的语言建模技术兼容，提高了代码准确性和执行性能。
    • Extended compatibility for Idea Community version users, introducing adaptation logic for various code languages. This enhancement enables the plugin to recognize and adapt to different code languages seamlessly.
    • 面向Idea Community版本的用户，增加了对其他代码语言的适配逻辑，使插件能够更好地识别和适应不同的代码语言。
    • Strengthened code assessment capabilities, ensuring stability and reliability in the scoring functionality.
    • 加强了代码评估的能力，确保评分功能的稳定性和可靠性。

  • IMPROVEMENT/优化：

    • Implemented backend and frontend adjustments for code assessment, enhancing stability and performance in both areas.
    • 为代码评估进行了前后端调整，提升了稳定性和性能。

2.11.0 (2023-11-13)

  • IMPROVEMENT/优化：

    • Enhanced Java Code Recognition: We've specifically focused on Java language this time, further enhancing the code recognition capabilities. This improvement aims to increase the accuracy of generated code, ensuring more precise and relevant responses for Java development scenarios.
    • 针对Java的代码识别能力提升: 在这次更新中，我们特别关注了Java语言，进一步提高了其代码识别能力。此次改进旨在提高生成代码的准确度，确保在Java开发场景中获得更精准、相关的响应。

2.10.2 (2023-10-18)

  • IMPROVEMENT/优化：

    • Code Recognition Enhancement: In various application scenarios, we have further improved code recognition capabilities to ensure users receive the most accurate answers.
    • 代码识别优化: 在各种应用场景中，我们进一步提高了代码的识别能力，确保用户能够获得更为精确的答案。
    • Response Quality Upgrade: For all application scenarios, we've refined the responses from ChatGPT, reducing and filtering out irrelevant or ineffective statements to ensure high-quality and practical content in replies.
    • 回复内容升级：针对所有应用场景，我们对ChatGPT的响应进行了筛选，减少并滤除了不相关或无效的语句，以保证回复内容的高质量与实用性。

2.10.0 (2023-09-28)

  • FEATURE/功能：

    • For the comment generation feature; now adapts to user's naming conventions, ensuring that comments align with expectations even when naming isn't standardized.
    • 生成注释的功能：现在可以适应用户的命名习惯，确保即使在命名不规范的情况下，生成的注释内容与预期一致。
    • Upgraded the todo feature; the generated methods now utilize existing methods from related functionalities, preventing repetitive generation of similar methods.
    • todo功能升级：生成的方法现在会使用当前相关功能已有的方法，避免多次生成功能相同的方法。

  • IMPROVEMENT/优化：

    • Optimized internal algorithms for more efficient comment and method generation.
    • 优化内部算法，使注释和方法生成更加高效。

2.9.4 (2023-09-14)

  • FEATURE/功能：

    • For Java; Greatly enhanced the ability to generate code based on todo. The accuracy of the returned code has been significantly increased, and its executability has been qualitatively improved.
    • 针对Java，极大提高了根据todo生成代码的能力，返回的代码准确度大幅增加，同时可执行度有质的提升。
    • Improved the quality of comments in the code commenting feature.
    • 代码注释功能的注释质量提高。

  • IMPROVEMENT/优化：

    • Refactored the code for increased stability, now supports opening multiple IDEs.
    • 重构代码，稳定性提高，目前已支持开启多个ide。
    • Slightly improved the stability of code assessment.
    • 小幅度提升代码评估的稳定性。

2.9.3 (2023-09-13)

  • FIX/修复：

    • Fixed the issue where the plugin failed to recognize the language model selection when manually entering chat content.
    • 修复了插件在直接手动输入聊天内容时，选择语言模型无效的问题。

2.9.2 (2023-09-05)

  • New Features/新功能：

    • Added a feature that allows you to auto-generate code based on the selected TODO descriptions. By highlighting the TODO comment, the plugin can generate code snippets to potentially fulfill the described task. 添加了一个功能，可以根据选中的TODO描述自动生成代码。只需高亮显示TODO注释，插件就可以生成代码片段，可能完成描述的任务。

2.9.0 (2023-08-06)

  • New Features/新功能：

    • Added a feature that allows you to auto-generate code comments using ChatGPT. By simply highlighting the code, the plugin will call on the ChatGPT AI model to generate comprehensive and contextually appropriate code comments. 添加了使用ChatGPT自动生成代码注释的功能。只需简单地圈选代码，插件就会调用ChatGPT AI模型生成全面且符合上下文的代码注释。
    • Introduced an AI-assisted development mode. This feature enables developers to get on-the-fly code suggestions, increasing coding efficiency. 引入了AI辅助开发模式，开发者可以得到实时的代码建议，提高编码效率。

  • Optimizations/优化：

    • Enhanced the stability of the plugin during continuous coding sessions. 提高了连续编码会话中插件的稳定性。

2.8.6 (2023-06-22)

  • New Features/新功能：

    • Added a Code Evaluation feature to allow team leaders to control the quality of the code. 添加了代码评估功能，方便团队领导来把控代码质量。

  • Optimizations/优化：

    • Optimized the dialogue box to follow input and prevent erratic jumping. 优化了对话框跟随输入，避免乱跳。
    • Improved natural language recognition logic for enhanced accuracy and performance. 自然语言识别逻辑已经优化，现在识别准确度和性能得到提升。

  • Bug Fixes/Bug修复：

    • Fixed the issue where pop-ups for new users failed to appear. 修复了新用户弹窗弹出失败的问题。

2.5.2 (2023-06-14)

  • 新功能：

    • 添加历史记录功能，方便用户查看之前的对话和操作记录。[Added history recording feature for users to view previous conversations and actions.]
    • 界面添加英语提示，使插件更加友好，方便外国友人使用。[Added English prompts to the interface for improved usability and foreign user-friendliness.]

  • 优化：

    • 自然语言识别逻辑已经优化，现在识别准确度和性能得到提升。[Improved natural language recognition logic for enhanced accuracy and performance.]
    • 代码输入逻辑经过优化，解决了代码输入不完整的问题，提供更流畅的代码补全体验。[Optimized code input logic to address incomplete code input and provide smoother code autocompletion experience.]

  • Bug修复：

    • 修复了对话框未清空的问题，现在每次新的对话都会自动清空对话框，方便用户进行新的输入。[Fixed the issue where the dialogue box was not cleared, now it gets automatically cleared for each new conversation, allowing convenient input.]

2.0.1 (2023-06-09)

  • 自然语言识别

    我们知道，在阅读代码或者尝试理解一个新的函数或模块时，不同的人可能使用不同的语言或术语。因此，我们的插件现在可以自动识别用户的自然语言，并将返回的注释和解释设为用户的常用语言。这意味着不论您是使用中文，英文，法文还是其他任何语言，我们的插件都可以为您提供便利。这使得在多语言团队中的合作变得更加无缝，并且能更好地理解和学习新的代码。

  • 按需生成代码

    在此次重大更新中，我们的插件现在可以根据您的需求生成代码。只需简单地描述您需要什么，插件就会为您生成对应的代码。无论您是需要一个新的函数，一个数据库查询，或是一段复杂的逻辑，我们的插件都能帮助您快速地生成代码，大大提高了您的工作效率。

  • 自动识别代码类型

    我们的插件现在可以自动识别您正在处理的代码类型，无论是 Kotlin（Kt），Java，Go，还是 SQL。这意味着您无需花费额外的时间去配置或切换不同的工具或模式。我们的插件会根据您的代码智能地适应并提供相应的支持。

1.0.6 (2023-06-07)

  • 添加私有化的gpt的支持。出于代码安全，很多公司选择自建gpt服务，避免关键代码泄漏
  • 优化：选中代码，交由gpt优化后，自动打开gpt对话框
  • 添加支持gpt-3.5-turbo

1.0.5 (2023-06-05)

  • 布局更换为JEditorPane
  • 添加支持MD语法的展示框

idea-plugin.description:
Feature/特性

Code Generation Based on TODO/根据todo生成代码

Introduced the ability to generate code based on TODO comments within a project. This feature enables rapid development by transforming actionable TODOs into functional code segments. 在项目中根据TODO评论生成代码的能力已被引入。此功能通过将可操作的TODO转化为功能性代码段，实现了快速开发。

Natural Language Recognition/自然语言识别

Improved the logic for natural language recognition, enhancing accuracy and performance. 改进了自然语言识别逻辑，提高了准确度和性能。

Automatic Code Type Recognition/自动识别代码类型

Enhanced the code type recognition feature to automatically identify code types. 提升了代码类型识别功能，自动识别代码类型。

Generate Code On Demand/按需生成代码

Automatic Code Comments Generation/自动生成代码注释

Added a feature that allows you to auto-generate code comments using ChatGPT. By simply highlighting the code, the plugin will call on the ChatGPT AI model to generate comprehensive and contextually appropriate code comments. 添加了使用ChatGPT自动生成代码注释的功能。只需简单地圈选代码，插件就会调用ChatGPT AI模型生成全面且符合上下文的代码注释。

Implemented the capability to generate code on demand, providing code snippets when needed. 增加按需生成代码的功能，根据需要提供代码片段。

History Recording Feature/历史记录功能

Added a history recording feature to prevent data loss. Every conversation will now be recorded, allowing easy access to previous interactions. 增加了历史记录功能，防止数据丢失。每次对话都会被记录，方便查看之前的交互记录。

The project now ensures that no content is lost and has been optimized accordingly. 该项目现在确保不丢失任何内容，并进行了相应的优化。

Code Assessment/代码评估

Introduced a new Code Assessment feature, allowing team leaders to evaluate team members' code. This feature aims to facilitate code reviews, improve code quality, and foster continuous learning within the team. 新引入了代码评估功能，允许团队领导评估团队成员的代码。这个功能旨在促进代码审查，提高代码质量，并在团队中促进持续学习。


GPT4_lll is a plugin designed for IntelliJ IDEA users, aiming to provide real-time code querying and analysis services using OpenAI's GPT-4 model. This plugin serves as a powerful assistant while you write or read code, helping you better understand and improve your code.

GPT4_lll是为IntelliJ IDEA用户设计的插件，旨在利用OpenAI的GPT-4模型提供实时的代码查询和分析服务。这个插件在你编写或阅读代码时充当一个强大的助手，帮助你更好地理解和改进你的代码。


The core functionalities of this plugin are generated by ChatGpt itself, and I have made only a few modifications to the text. I am grateful for the outstanding work and technical support of artificial intelligence.

这个插件的核心功能是由ChatGpt自动生成的，我只对文本进行了少量修改。对人工智能的出色工作和技术支持表示感激。


GPT4_lll plugin is a clean plugin with no potential risks or security issues. We warmly welcome aspiring individuals to join our development team and collaborate on enhancing this plugin.

GPT4_lll插件是一个干净的插件，没有潜在的风险或安全问题。我们热烈欢迎有抱负的人加入我们的开发团队，共同改进这个插件。


The development of this plugin was a necessary move. The previous plugin I used required entering personal OPENAI_API_KEY, but unfortunately, my account information was misused, and the data was abused, resulting in the suspension of my account.

开发这个插件是一种无奈之举。我之前使用的插件要求输入个人的OPENAI_API_KEY，但不幸的是，我的账户信息被滥用，数据被滥用，导致我的账户被封禁。

Help/帮助

Usage Guide/使用指南

  1. Open IntelliJ IDEA's settings by navigating to "File" > "Settings".
  2. Open the "Other Settings" category.
  3. Find and select "GPT4_lll Settings".
  4. Enter your API key and proxy settings (if required).

If you need any assistance or have any questions, please feel free to contact me:

如果您需要任何帮助或有任何问题，请随时与我联系：

  • Email/电子邮件: 892821031@qq.com
  • GitHub: https://github.com/lukenc/GPT4_lll
